channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: White House Orders Agencies to Escalate Fight Against Offshore Wind
item.description: The effort involves several agencies that typically have little to do with wind power, including the Health and Human Services Department.

item.title: Trump-backed crypto firm American Bitcoin notches $5 billion valuation in Nasdaq debut
item.description: The company trades under the ticker ABTC.

item.title: New Nestlé CEO joined the company straight out college—like Mary Barra and Doug McMillon, he climbed all the way to the top at a single company
item.description: Philipp Navratil joins Fortune 500 leaders in proving that playing the long game up the same corporate ladder can pay off.

item.title: Putin Takes His ‘Limo Diplomacy’ to China
item.description: Rides in his hulking bulletproof Aurus with the Indian and North Korean leaders offered the Russian leader an ideal setting for deepening ties.
